column5: Well it is over my first stand up in front of everyone my legs were shaking so i jabbed myself in the rear with a push pin and got on with the grunt next one was better and the last one was great. Now I can pass my bad habits on to those that wish to know. I learned a lot it was a good crew and the whole thing was very enjoyable.  Onward and Upward  Peter
Congrats! - definately something to be proud of!  Tracker (Don)
Atta Boy Pete, I knew you'd do well !!
Congrats to you Peter! That's quite the feather in your cap. You and your family should be proud. And to think....I knew you when you only saved lives. Now you teach others.
SEE !!! we told you you could do it !!! Congrats to you.
NICE....now I know who to call the next time I'm drowning in Canadian waters...or do you travel..LOL
Right on man.  Good to here you made it through the fist few alight.
Good job Pete I am glad to see you stepped up and became an instructor.   Art
Great job Peter.................hearty congrat's you should be proud!
